properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: The time the tweet was posted

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username of the user who posted the tweet

properties.name: retweets
properties.description: The number of times the tweet was retweeted

properties.name: favorites
properties.description: The number of times the tweet was favorited

properties.name: tweetId
properties.description: Unique id for the tweet generated by Twitter
